languages.text: "Да... За пару дней весь дом Целлиусов упаковали в грузовой шаттл и отправили в один конец. А спустя год нашли настоящих заговорщиков".
"Yes... Every member of House Cellius was packed into a cargo shuttle and sent on a one-way voyage. And then a year later we found the real conspirators."
languages.original_text: "Да... За пару дней весь дом Целлиусов упаковали в грузовой шаттл и отправили в один конец. А спустя год нашли настоящих заговорщиков".

traits.locale_text: "Yes... Every member of House Cellius was packed into a cargo shuttle and sent on a one-way voyage. And then a year later we found the real conspirators."
"Yes... Every member of House Cellius was packed into a cargo shuttle and sent on a one-way voyage. And then a year later we found the real conspirators."
"Yes... Every member of House Cellius was packed into a cargo shuttle and sent on a one-way voyage. And then a year later we found the real conspirators."
"Yes... Every member of House Cellius was packed into a cargo shuttle and sent on a one-way voyage. And then a year later we found the real conspirators."

languages.text: « Oui... Chacun des membres de la maison Cellius a été emmené à bord d'une navette de transport et expédié en voyage sans retour. Ce n'est qu'un an plus tard que les véritables conspirateurs ont été démasqués. »
languages.original_text: "Yes... Every member of House Cellius was packed into a cargo shuttle and sent on a one-way voyage. And then a year later we found the real conspirators."

traits.locale_text: « Oui... Chacun des membres de la maison Cellius a été emmené à bord d'une navette de transport et expédié en voyage sans retour. Ce n'est qu'un an plus tard que les véritables conspirateurs ont été démasqués. »

languages.text: “是啊……塞利乌斯家族的每名成员都被塞进了货舱穿梭机，踏上了一去不复返的旅途。过了一年之后，我们才找到了真正的幕后黑手。”
languages.original_text: "Yes... Every member of House Cellius was packed into a cargo shuttle and sent on a one-way voyage. And then a year later we found the real conspirators."

traits.locale_text: “是啊……塞利乌斯家族的每名成员都被塞进了货舱穿梭机，踏上了一去不复返的旅途。过了一年之后，我们才找到了真正的幕后黑手。”

languages.text: 「そうです…セリウス家の全員が貨物シャトルに詰め込まれ、片道の航海へと送り出されました。そして、真の陰謀者が明らかとなったのは1年後のことでした」
languages.original_text: "Yes... Every member of House Cellius was packed into a cargo shuttle and sent on a one-way voyage. And then a year later we found the real conspirators."

traits.locale_text: 「そうです…セリウス家の全員が貨物シャトルに詰め込まれ、片道の航海へと送り出されました。そして、真の陰謀者が明らかとなったのは1年後のことでした」

languages.text: "Ja ... Sämtlicher Mitglieder von Haus Cellius wurde in ein Frachtshuttle gestopft und auf eine Reise ohne Wiederkehr geschickt. Und dann, ein Jahr später, haben wir die wahren Verschwörer gefunden."
languages.original_text: "Yes... Every member of House Cellius was packed into a cargo shuttle and sent on a one-way voyage. And then a year later we found the real conspirators."

traits.locale_text: "Ja ... Sämtlicher Mitglieder von Haus Cellius wurde in ein Frachtshuttle gestopft und auf eine Reise ohne Wiederkehr geschickt. Und dann, ein Jahr später, haben wir die wahren Verschwörer gefunden."

languages.text: «Efectivamente... la casa Cellius al completo fue asignada a una lanzadera de carga y enviada en un viaje de ida. Un año después, encontramos a los verdaderos conspiradores».
languages.original_text: "Yes... Every member of House Cellius was packed into a cargo shuttle and sent on a one-way voyage. And then a year later we found the real conspirators."

traits.locale_text: «Efectivamente... la casa Cellius al completo fue asignada a una lanzadera de carga y enviada en un viaje de ida. Un año después, encontramos a los verdaderos conspiradores».

languages.text: "Evet... Cellius Hanesi'nin her bir mensubu, bir yük mekiğine tıkılmış ve tek yönlü bir yolculuğa gönderilmişti. Bir yıl sonra gerçek komplocuları bulmuştuk."
languages.original_text: "Yes... Every member of House Cellius was packed into a cargo shuttle and sent on a one-way voyage. And then a year later we found the real conspirators."
